Description: Fastenal Company, a national hardware store distributor, reached a settlement with the United States following an investigation of alleged false claims in connection with a General Services Administration contract.

Description: The Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs found that Fastenal Company discriminated against 171 job applicants who sought general warehouse positions at two of its distribution facilities in Indianapolis and Atlanta.
